definition: midnight/in the middle of the night
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
in the depth of night/late at night
in the depth of the night/very late at night
first half of the night/time before midnight
first half of the night (from nightfall to midnight)
He who never wrongs others does not fear the knock in the night./Rest with a clear conscience.
pinyin: ping2 sheng1 bu4 zuo4 kui1 xin1 shi4 , ban4 ye4 qiao1 men2 xin1 bu4 jing1
containing_words.word: 平生不做虧心事，半夜敲門心不驚

definition: lit. the black sky of midnight/very late at night (idiom)

sentences.english: I was chatting with someone and didn't go back to my apartment until midnight.
sentences.chinese: 我聊天去了，聊到半夜纔回房間睡覺。

sentences.english: At midnight my brother and nephew went to get fuel.
sentences.chinese: 大半夜裏，我哥哥和外甥去弄燃油。

sentences.english: How often do you lose sleep due to late-night log-ins?
sentences.chinese: 你是否會由於到了半夜才登錄上網而損失睡眠時間？

sentences.english: I didn't know that I was going to ride, and that it would be night.
sentences.chinese: 我哪兒知道要騎馬，又要走到三更半夜呢。

sentences.english: Cal stays out every night until after midnight.
sentences.chinese: 凱爾每晚在外面一呆就是到下半夜。

sentences.english: He is off at 6 pm, but usually leave his office around midnight.
sentences.chinese: 他六點下班，但通常都是快半夜才走。

sentences.english: At midnight he pulled the blanket over him.
sentences.chinese: 到半夜時他拉過毯子蓋在身上。

sentences.english: The attacks began late Wednesday and continued into Thursday morning.
sentences.chinese: 襲擊從星期三後半夜開始，持續到星期四早晨。

sentences.english: It seems that he went away in the small hours.
sentences.chinese: 他似乎是在後半夜出走的。

sentences.english: One Mexican family was rousted out of bed in the middle of the night and quarantined.
sentences.chinese: 一家墨西哥人，在半夜被叫醒，然後隔離。

sentences.english: The ray in a twinkling gets black ugg tall seem period a meantime became night-time from the noon.
sentences.chinese: 光線瞬間變暗，好像時間一下子就從正午變成了半夜。

sentences.english: Never shut down you mobile, in case of I am sick , I need you take me to hosipital , stay with me.
sentences.chinese: 唔好關機，萬一半夜我有事要去急症室我想你陪住我。

sentences.english: A leprous woman gave birth to a lovely baby at midnight.
sentences.chinese: 一個患有痲瘋病的婦人，半夜生下一名可愛的嬰兒。

sentences.english: I often lose myself in thought late at night!
sentences.chinese: 我經常三更半夜陷入沉思，迷失自我。

sentences.english: Middle of the night singing, sing the tears, sang dead heart.
sentences.chinese: 半夜的歌聲，唱出了眼淚，唱死了心。

sentences.english: Why are you getting up in the middle of the night?
sentences.chinese: 要是半夜三更竊賊進入我的房間，我就會扔東西打他。

definition: in the depth of night/late at night
the whole night/all through the night
in the depth of the night/very late at night
first half of the night (from nightfall to midnight)
time/period during the day/one of the 12 two-hour periods enumerated by the earthly branches 地支
